website_summaries.verdict: While it doesn't live up to its billing as "the world's smallest audiophile Bluetooth speaker," the Monster SupersStar has some nice attributes, including a slim, splash-resistant design and built-in speakerphone.
pros: The Monster SuperStar has a compact, slim design, making it very travel-friendly
It plays loud for its size, has a built-in speakerphone, and is splash-resistant
cons: Distorts at higher volumes, particularly with bass-heavy material, and is a bit overpriced at $130

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th Monster speaker that I've purchased. Reasonable price, small footprint, great sound. Perfect to throw in a suitcase when traveling. I don't think you can go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: SGS

customer_reviews.title: Initially I really liked the size and portability of this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Initially I really liked the size and portability of this speaker, until it stopped working altogether (unit no longer charged) after 3 months of limited use. I asked Tech Concepts the seller to replace the item... they never replied to my 2 emails (via Amazon and direct). I have to revert to the Manufacturer for warranty replacement (Monster were helpful - fyi they replace, but you must pay for the shipping to return to the manufacturer). Initially good experience but ultimately very disappointing and time consuming,
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Sad performance. Great little package.
customer_reviews.text: Really was hoping for a little more. Bass performance is really lacking in this little guy. I guess for $45 you get what you pay for. I love everthing else about it. Size, easy of opreration, volume control increments. But bottom line it is a speaker.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: This Little Guy Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This has great sound quality. It doesn't get distorted, have a hallow sound or vibrate itself off the table at high volumes. Honestly I was in shock at how great this sounded. My mom got it free through her mobile provider. When I heard it I had to have one. Nice and compact. I'm not an expert in speakers but I love music and usually go for the top of the line. Of course you will get better quality from a larger speaker but this little guy ROCKS!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T.

customer_reviews.title: Very loud but batter dont last
customer_reviews.text: very loud for a lil speaker and have a nice sound quality, the box was open when i received it and looks like its use. Battery only last for 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Allen E.

customer_reviews.title: No battery life
customer_reviews.text: It’s loud but the battery life is horrible within two weeks of my purchase it would die if not plugged in and after about a month it would die while on the charger, I wouldn’t recommend you could get something way better for this price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound System
customer_reviews.text: Produces a big beautiful sound from a small box! A great sound system. Easy to carry and enjoyable to listen to.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker mostly for outdoors use, in situations where small size and big volume really matter. The thin profile and rectangular shape mean you can literally slip it into a jacket pocket. And yet this thing really pumps out the sound. I've been incredibly pleased with the speaker and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nels

customer_reviews.title: Mini Boombox
customer_reviews.text: I needed a portable speaker for my devices and I like the bluetooth and 3.5mm input versatility.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. More money more sound, but monster puts out great products
customer_reviews.author: keithcitty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker for sure for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get a usb charger but it’s fine I have a whole bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Bup N.Sen

customer_reviews.title: Its good.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SOUNDS. Not so great bluetooth range though... so you have to keep your phone near. My Sony Bluetooth headphones I can play basketball with my phone in my gym bag on the sidelines and I'm good. Not with this though. If you walk 25 ft away it starts losing reception.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Close Enough For Rock And Roll
customer_reviews.text: It's not a "clear and perfect" sounding speaker, though it's not bad at most listening levels. It does distort a bit at maximum volume, but fortunately, that maximum is QUITE LOUD. If you need something small, with a little oomph behind it, and don't mind if it isn't clear as a bell, this is a solid choice.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Atchison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for Christmas. He loves it, sound is clear!!!
customer_reviews.author: christina quiroz

customer_reviews.title: it sounds great but it's just not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Having previously owned the Monster Clarity HD, I expected a similar sounding Bluetooth speaker. However it is nowhere near as loud as the Clarity, it sounds great but it's just not very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Howard

customer_reviews.title: sound is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I do not normally rate products however this product is defective. the sound on this product is very minimal. it is lower than my phone speaker. not sure if I got a defective one but definitely not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Crystal clear

customer_reviews.title: Let it stay in 2014 save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I dont want to eff you over but this speaker is garbage. It just sounds like a extra loud phone. I will be giving this waste of money to someone to discard on their own discretion.
customer_reviews.author: Keith fox

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm from FL and love to be out by the pool. This speaker can go anywhere. Simple enough for my husband to use! Great sound quality and volume!
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker. Really enjoying the sound quality for my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: 100% GOOD ONE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A CHAMPION SPEAKER !!!! 100% GOOD ONE !!! FULL RECOMMNEDED !!!
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR  S. DE LA CRUZ

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awesome! Works great for poolside music from your iphone
customer_reviews.text: Sounds awesome! Works great for poolside music from your iphone. Awesome sound from such a tiny box.
customer_reviews.author: S. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Not as loud as it was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It's good for use in the car though. At least I can play the songs on my iPod.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: small but powerful.  Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my car to play tunes from my phone or tablet and it works great and tucks away nicely in a purse!
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Pretty hearty speaker system for a tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Pretty hearty speaker system for a tiny box.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Renner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a lot of bang for the buck. Great sound quality and plenty of volume.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cichowicz

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for the the money but the not best.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: I bought this speaker less than 3 months, it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker less than 3 months, it got busted after I had the speaker on for 30 minutes. It can't be recharged to be reactivated. I want a replacement or full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kao

customer_reviews.text: The battery only last for about an hour and the sound is distorted depending on what song play
customer_reviews.author: austen moody

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY MONSTER.!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY MONSTER SUPERSTAR BLUETOOTH SPEAKER - IT HAS A GREAT SOUND WITH SUPER BASS.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone sherrod

customer_reviews.title: Good sounding speaker, but doesn't hold up long.
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speaker, but only lasted six months. Cannot charge it any longer as the connection seems to be loose where you plug in to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: frenchie9700

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my Superstar speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant about purchasing this product... I am very happy with my Superstar speaker! Not only loud but great clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. Very small, sufficiently loud, clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker....has excellent sound and performs great as a speakerphone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It has terrific sound, is easy to use, small and easily portable...what else is there to say!
customer_reviews.author: Sjo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great clear sound! It is compact and easy to use! Love this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Love

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats Pill
customer_reviews.text: Instant Bluetooth connection Good bass for size Good battery life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound Bad battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but battery life is not good only 3 hours on a full charge. Was expecting a better battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound. Wish that it had a little more volume, but I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker at a great price amazing the sound that this little speaker puts out
customer_reviews.author: martin wilson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Quality speaker for it's size. A slight fuzz sound when there is not any music playing. I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Junior22

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a pretty good speaker I was just looking for something Louder.
customer_reviews.author: belle

customer_reviews.title: Soar from Creative - Good Balance of sound - with different types of music
customer_reviews.text: Looking for something very portable. I have the Big Jambox - Loud but bulky to carry around. Soar from Creative - Good Balance of sound - with different types of music, but heavy. Monster Superstar - Loud for its size, clear, but with heavy bass - slight distortion. Super Portable and overall a Good Buy. After I bought it, Price went down to &70+bucks 8( Overall, good balance of sound, nothing too overbearing, good to set up with my Tablet & phone. Durable build, quality product. Just wanted to know would it be possible to daisy chain (2 or more) for the simulated stereo/surround sound effect??
customer_reviews.author: honest opinion man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker for the money! Better I thought than the Bose of the same cost.
customer_reviews.author: JohnDoe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice little speaker seems a bit cheaply made as far as the buttons go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Monster Power Superstar speaker did not meet my standards ...
customer_reviews.text: The Monster Power Superstar speaker did not meet my standards and unfortunately I had to return it. It just didn't provide the sound or the power I was looking for. I had purchased a little ihome speaker from the local Walgreens before I had purchased the Monster and it actually plays the music off of my phone a lot louder than the Monster. The speaker from Walgreens was only about $25 on sale. The price was a lot cheaper and the sound is a lot louder. So I stuck with the cheaper ihome speaker. Sorry Monster. 😩
customer_reviews.author: Janet D.

customer_reviews.title: The one I have it won't turn on unless it's ...
customer_reviews.text: The one I have it won't turn on unless it's plugged in even if it's fully charged anyone know how to fix it?
customer_reviews.author: Wade patterson

customer_reviews.title: I was little disappointed with the top end volume
customer_reviews.text: I just bought one of these. I have only used it with my Apple 5 to stream music. I was little disappointed with the top end volume. I also thought there was a lot of static. Has anyone else had better luck with other devices or with a wired connection?
customer_reviews.author: ck

product_meta.title: Monster Power Superstar High Definition Bluetooth Speaker (Black/Grey)-Ultra compact, Water-resistant
product_meta.description: Color:Black And Grey| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe sound that fills the room is clean, articulate and transparent. And when paired with your smartphone, it brings crystal clear calls to a whole new level. SuperStar—Pure Monster Sound in the palm of your hand. The SuperStar wireless speaker barely fills your pocket, but can fill a room with rich, audiophile sound. That’s because, contained within its smartphone-sized confines, it houses two full range drivers up front and two bass radiators, one front facing and one rear facing. It’s also wireless, so you can stream your favorite music channels or beam a playlist without wires or cables
feature_bullets: Rechargeable lithium Ion battery allows over 5 hours of play
Built in mic with advanced noise cancellation enables clear wireless hands-free calling and conferencing
